synopsis.text:
It's time to brace yourself for an unconventional adventure as the notorious Suicide Squad, comprised of DC's most dangerous super-villains, is thrust into the heart of an Isekai realm! Led by the indomitable Amanda Waller, head of A.R.G.U.S., this infamous team of misfits - including Harley Quinn, Deadshot, Peacemaker, Clayface, and King Shark - finds themselves in a world teeming with magic, swords, and dragons.

With a lethal nano-bomb implanted in their necks, escape is nothing more than a distant dream, and failure means certain death. As they navigate this perilous world, they must face off against raging orcs and colossal dragons while also keeping their own mischievous tendencies in check. And, as if things couldn't get any wilder, the Joker himself joins this twisted party.

Prepare for a thrilling rollercoaster ride as this powerful squad wreaks havoc in this otherworldly realm, merging the worlds of DC and Isekai like never before in this original Japanese animation. Will Harley Quinn and her band of criminals rise to the challenge and conquer this treacherous new world? Only one way to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
